marklogic.body: I attended the conference and I find it eerie that this guy was present. I am trying to think of all the young guys who were there and who of them looked suspicious. Who left the banquet early? Usually these moles are easy to Spot as you can see that they seem uncomfortable and unenthusiastic. This is why I don't put my last name on my nametag. Of course he doesn't want anyone to know that there were young women there such as myself or that most people there looked and Acted normal. By the way, the food was excellent and I find it quite juvenile that he jumped ship over hearing Fromm say that the Chinese shouldn't rule the world. Was that really that offensive?
